actions.Multiattack: The thessalhydra makes one maw attack and one Flurry of Bites.
actions.Flurry of Bites: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d4 + 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (4d4) poison damage.
actions.Maw: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d4 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) acid damage.
actions.Tail Pincer: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d4 + 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage, and the target is grappled. As an action, the target can escape the grapple by succeeding on a DC 14+1d4 + 12 Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check (its choice). Until this grapple ends, the thessalhydra can't use its tail pincer.
actions.Acid Saliva (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The thessalhydra spits a glob of acid at a point it can see within 30 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 15+1d4 + 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

options.Detect: The thessalhydra makes a Wisdom (Perception) check with advantage.
options.Tail Swipe: The thessalhydra makes a tail pincer attack.
